section.name: Enterprise Java (605.784.31) Root
section.p: This is the course home page for the Enterprise Java Course (605.784), taught at John's Hopkins University, Engineering Programs for Professionals.

ul.li: 2006-09-13: Posted JDBC examples and lecture. Added JDBC Online tutorial exercise.
2006-09-07: Posted updates to exercise 0 that corrected munged URL text, typos, and missing javaee.jar issue
E-mail instructor about individual thoughts or questions on course
Post status to newsgroup of success, failures, or suggestions to others
